indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: Successful pilot of the extended LFS – MPI in Saint Lucia in preparation for national implementation and to support discussions at the OECS LSMC on the application of the sub-regional MPI

baseline.comment: Lack of multi-dimensional approaches to poverty measurement to inform evidence based decision making for policy and programme development

target.comment: To develop and implement an RSDS Support formal adoption of MPI for national level implementation

actual.comment: Support evidence based policy formulation for social protection and poverty reduction through support for multi-dimensional approaches to poverty measurement, this in conjunction with the OECS Commission and OECS Member states; Enhance technical services in managing for development results through the provision of support for capacity building among technical persons at the Statistical Department

iati-activity.title: Recovery Framework in Dominica
iati-activity.description: Tropical Storm Erika produced intense rainfall causing flash flooding. As of August 30, 2015, twenty persons confirmed dead. The Government has also reported 574 persons are homeless, 300 evacuated and 267 in shelters.
